title: Analysis of AVATAR: Java-Python Program Translation
description: Exploring AVATAR, a dataset for program translation using AI models like PLBART and TransCoder.

title: Machine Learning Training from InterShala: Notes and Review
description: A comprehensive summary of key machine learning concepts and techniques covered in the Intern Shala course.

title: Development of an Autocorrect System Using Language and Channel Models
description: The project focuses on the development of an autocorrect model using natural language processing (NLP) techniques. The system is built using Probabilitics Models rather than training deep neural networks.

title: Next Word Recommender System using Probabilistic Approach
description: A next words recommender system i built during my NLP training. The system uses a probabilistic approach to predict the next word in a sentence.
